attributes.action: Strip Sir Philip Nigel Ross Green of his Knighthood
attributes.background: This Man does not meet the moral standards required to be a Knight of the Garter in both his personal and business life.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
